channel.title: Sigma 400 Owners Site
channel.description: Recent content on Sigma 400 Owners Site

item.title: Known Sigma 400's
item.description: boats A very fast cruiser racer of Rob Humphries hull design based on the 1988 Whitbread Maxi “Rothmans”. She delivers spectacularly in heavy weather with balance, stability and no slamming Baiji ? Prime Evil - South coast? Miss behavingi Again - (Pinocchio) Based in Clyde 2003 - Current location Lonian or Croatia? Sunrise - Clyde - 1993 Sigmagic - Originally Wales, cruised and based Clyde since 2002 Thalia - Dublin now possibly in Denmark - 1992
